summary: HEADLIGHTS FLICKER ON AND OFF WHILE DRIVING.  WHEN THE AIR CONDITIONING IS ENGAGED, PROBLEM BECOMES WORSE.  CONSUMER HAS TAKEN VEHICLE TO DEALER 4 TIMES FOR REPAIRS.  DEALER HAS DIAGNOSED PROBLEM AS A SHORT TERM VOLTAGE DROP WITHIN THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM AND HAS EVEN REPLACED THE ALTERNATOR, BUT WAS UNABLE TO CORRECT ISSUE.*AK
